department.dept_long_name: Department of Celtic Languages and Literatures

course.title: The Literature of Medieval Celtic Christianity: The Hagiographical Tradition
course.description: A study of selected texts associated with medieval saints' cults in Ireland, Wales, Brittany and Scotland, including saints' lives, voyage and vision narratives, hymns, prayers and poetry, in the context of the history of Christianity in the Celtic lands.
course.notes: All texts are read in English translation.
